description:
This Office 365 course is designed for everyone working with Microsoft Office and not just limited to those who actually want to work with Office 365.

In just 2 hours and 20 minutes you will learn how to “get it done from anywhere” on a PC, Mac, phone or tablet. As an Office 365 expert, you will know everything you need to about the Outlook Web App. Team Sites allow you to work together on the same document in real-time. Making video or audio calls with Lync is a breeze after this course. You will be a pro at installing Office 365 on your mobile devices and using Onedrive for Cloud storage is simple and safe.
title: Office 365 is coming… Don’t panic - Prepare!
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
